column4: guys i tried to upgrade to hardy from Gutsy last night via uptdate manager, and its got 6 mins left till finishing installing new updates. and its not moving anymore, what do i do??
what did it stop on?
ha! i just had the same thing happen
open a terminal and sudo killall -9 locale-gen  - don't worry about any other errors - when it's all over and reboots, just sudo dpkg --configure -a  from ctrl-alt-f1  before logging into the gui
yes. i just noticed that mine just stumbled across language-support-writing-en
heh, i just nailed locale-gen again and it's going again
it's a bug that's already been reported, actually
it asked me if i wanted to report it or not ;)
yes.
yeah, i just looked at the process list and bam, there it was again
hrm, let me think about that one for a nanosecond.. let's see, i had to killall -9 locale-gen before....
just read the manpage ;)
this is what the bug reporting system is for.
i'm.. working on that :)
ah - sudo apt-get -f install
moment...
ok, it just rebooted just fine....
and now, the locales are generating
i just ran sudo apt-get -f install  and it just finished everything up. upgrade complete! :)
could be a pulseaudio anomoly
im using ALSA for everything, maybe try pulse?
